entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is mentioned as a school that will not be competing. It is introduced as the opposite of Hogwarts in this context.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a person who is upset about Durmstrang not being able to compete. He is described as making empty threats and trying to sound disdainful.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a person who enters the room and has a conversation with Karkaroff about Durmstrang not being able to compete. He is described as having a binding magical contract.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as someone whose name was put in the goblet by someone knowing he'd have to compete.
